abstract: Bronx Museum of the Arts announces partnership with National Museum of Fine Arts in Cuba that will involve major exchange of works; partnership follows years of curatorial negotiations that preceded diplomatic thaw in relations between the United States and Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The Bronx Museum of the Arts and the National Museum of Fine Arts in Havana plan a major exchange of art that reflects a running conversation about their overlapping interests.
snippet: The Bronx Museum of the Arts and the National Museum of Fine Arts in Havana plan a major exchange of art that reflects a running conversation about their overlapping interests.

keywords.value: National Museum of Fine Arts (Havana, Cuba)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Bronx Museum of the Arts Plans Art Exchange With Cuba
headline.print_headline: Bronx Plans Art Exchange With Cuba
